channel.title: Dds, dcalws, gmaul and other weapons that hit more then once on npcs
channel.description: i noticed when u use dds spec, dcalws spec, darkbow spec, gmaul spec on npcs like dragons, it hits only once and the rest are 0s like in case of dclaws, u hit like a 40 then 3 0s, in dbow and dds u hit 1 good hit then one 0, in gmaul, ur first hit counts but if u have unlimited spec, every hit is gonna be 0. how do i fix this? how do i make it attack all npcs the same?

item.title: Dds, dcalws, gmaul and other weapons that hit more then once on npcs
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

This is on DeltaScape.
ok let me revise, i noticed that the weapons DDS, DarkBow, Gmaul and DagonClaws hit differently under different circumstances, when these weapons attack suck NPCs as Portals from PestControl and Dagg Kings their Special Attack hits like it should, Dragon claws hit 4X, Dbow and DDs 2X but when thase weapons are used to fight other NPCs like Blue dragons the weapons hit accurately only once then 99% of the time the weapons dont hit again, for example if DragonClaws Special Attack is used on Blue Dragon then it will hit 1 time usually around 40 and then the 3 other hits are all zeros, How can i make it so that it would hit 4 times on Blue Dragon, kapish?

Read full topic
item.source: Dds, dcalws, gmaul and other weapons that hit more then once on npcs
